Others: Jimmy Butler suffered a right ankle sprain during the game against the Denver Nuggets.
Erik Spoelstra expressed uncertainty about Butler's injury and mentioned that they will look for further updates.
Butler played only 7 minutes in the game, scoring 2 points, recording 2 assists, and collecting 1 rebound.
The Heat are concerned about Butler's health and the injury's severity.
The Heat's roster may experience changes due to Butler's injury.
Nikola Jovic, who was benched in the second half against the Nuggets, expressed his frustration about his performance.
